<title level="1" pfs="">[Tamikan](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1464)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 45

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 16">[Tamikan](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1464)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Dragon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=50" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 39</row>

**Perception** +23; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +29, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +33, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +27, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +27, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +26

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +5

**Con** +6

**Int** +1

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 38 

**Fort** +29 

**Ref** +27 

**Will** +26 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 295

**Immunities**
[paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> Tail only.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, fly 130 feet, swim 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +32 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d12+15 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) and piercing beak

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +32 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d8+15 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
wing +32 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d10+13 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +30 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d8+13 bludgeoning

**Boat Breaker**   A kongamato's beak is supernaturally hard. Their beak Strikes ignore half the Hardness of any object they hit.

**Flying Strafe** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The kongamato Flies up to their fly Speed and makes two wing Strikes at any point during that movement. Each Strike must target a different creature.

**Sonic Screech** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) Tamikan unleashes a powerful and deadly blast of sonic force from her maw that deals 12d6 sonic damage in a 100- foot line (DC 37 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). She can't use Sonic Screech again for 1d4 rounds.

**Wailing Dive** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The kongamato Flies while emitting a terrifying screech. Each creature the kongamato flies over must succeed at a DC 37 Will save or become [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (frightened 2 on a critical failure). After attempting their saves, the creatures are temporarily immune for 1 hour. At the end of their movement, the kongamato can make a beak Strike.

</column>
name: Tamikan

text: Tamikan Recall Knowledge - Dragon (Arcana): DC 45 Unspecific Lore : DC 43 Specific Lore : DC 40 Tamikan Source Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 39 Perception +23; darkvision Languages Draconic Skills Acrobatics +29, Athletics +33, Intimidation +27, Stealth +27, Survival +26 Str +9 Dex +5 Con +6 Int +1 Wis +4 Cha +5 --- AC 38 Fort +29 Ref +27 Will +26 +1 status to all saves vs. magic HP 295 Immunities paralyzed, sleep Attack of Opportunity Reaction Tail only. --- Speed 30 feet, fly 130 feet, swim 30 feet Melee Single Action beak +32 (Magical, reach 15 feet), Damage 3d12+15 piercing plus Grab and piercing beak Melee Single Action claw +32 (Agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 3d8+15 slashing Melee Single Action wing +32 (Agile, reach 15 feet), Damage 3d10+13 bludgeoning Melee Single Action tail +30 (Agile, reach 20 feet), Damage 3d8+13 bludgeoning Boat Breaker A kongamato's beak is supernaturally hard. Their beak Strikes ignore half the Hardness of any object they hit. Flying Strafe Two Actions The kongamato Flies up to their fly Speed and makes two wing Strikes at any point during that movement. Each Strike must target a different creature. Sonic Screech Two Actions (Arcane, Evocation, Sonic) Tamikan unleashes a powerful and deadly blast of sonic force from her maw that deals 12d6 sonic damage in a 100- foot line (DC 37 basic Reflex save). She can't use Sonic Screech again for 1d4 rounds. Wailing Dive Two Actions The kongamato Flies while emitting a terrifying screech. Each creature the kongamato flies over must succeed at a DC 37 Will save or become frightened 1 (frightened 2 on a critical failure). After attempting their saves, the creatures are temporarily immune for 1 hour. At the end of their movement, the kongamato can make a beak Strike.
